item.title: My First Blog Post!!
item.description: Hello!! This is my first official blog post, and I am going to use it to show off a little bit. Throughout this class, I learned how to use R, and I loved it. Towards, the end of class, we learned Python. Although, I personally enjoy R more than Python, we can actually use both of these programs at the same time, which is awesome! In the R chuck below, I'm going to be maniupulating some data from the "movies6" dataset from my second project.
